title: Implement JWT Authentication Middleware for VitaTrack API
instruction: Create comprehensive JWT authentication middleware for VitaTrack API. Implement token generation, validation, refresh token mechanism, and blacklisting. Setup role-based access control (RBAC), route protection, and permission checking. Configure token expiration strategies, secure token storage recommendations, and multi-device session management. Implement password hashing with bcrypt, account lockout mechanisms, and security event logging. Include social authentication preparation and MFA support structure.
